Hello everyone and welcome! My name is Alymbek and I am a M.Sc. student in Autonomous Systems. I work currently on my master's thesis with the title "Learning tactile skills for architectural assembly". I cooperate with two 7 degrees-of-freedom leightweight robotic arms KUKA iiwa. I also know how to teach the robot to play beerpong with a win percentage of ca. 80%.

I am a software developer at Varian Medical Systems developing a distributed machine learning portal for medical researchers. We speak C#, Typescript and T-SQL.

I love my lovely fiancée, guitars, chess, jogging, football, tennis, winter sports, singing and F.C.Barcelona.
